nodes.text: The 128th Flight was a flight of droid starfighters comprised of Vulture-class battle droids colored light-blue and light-gray that—as with the Vulture droids of 72nd Flight—had more accurate targeting systems, but less defensive capabilities, than the droid starfighters of 28th Flight and 31st Flight. The 128th Flight of droid starfighters fought during the Clone Wars for the Confederacy of Independent Systems as part of the Confederate Navy.
The 128th Flight was represented with a miniature in the initial release of the Star Wars PocketModel trading card game in 2007.
